backend/main.mo: Defines the canisterâ€™s data models for jobs, applications, contacts, and profiles, and seeds initial job postings with experience and salary ranges.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration that converts old job postings to the new format by adding salaryRange and a default experienceRange.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend files describing their roles and functionality.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md: Documentation detailing how to map glitchip.in to the deployed IC canister via Cloudflare DNS.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles and color variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that loads fonts, favicon, and mounts the React application.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Specifies glitchip.in as the permitted custom domain for the canister.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, routes, React Query client, and global theme provider.
Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and page transition around routed pages.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: Applies a fade transition between route changes with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component that swaps to a gradient fallback on load failure while preserving layout.
frontend/src/components/SectionReveal.ts: A wrapper component that animates its children into view using IntersectionObserver, with reduced-motion fallback.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, services, social links, and a bottom bar.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides a responsive site header with navigation, logo, and mobile menu via a sheet component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity auth, managing login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that returns whether the user prefers reduced motion using a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching jobs, contacts, and submitting forms via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light/dark color systems, motion preferences, and custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx: Implements the careers page with job listings and a detailed application form including education, work history, and resume upload. Manages dialog state, form fields, and submission via job application API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form and company contact info, handling form submission via API and showing success or error toasts. Includes a hero section and styled layout components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero content, service highlights, and company stats using styled components and images. Provides navigation links to contact and services pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a 'coming soon' message for future products with placeholder cards. Contains minimal interactivity and focuses on presentation.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Presents detailed service offerings with summaries, capabilities, deliverables, and engagement models. Uses cards and icons to render a structured multi-section services page.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditionsPag: Displays terms and conditions for job applications inside a styled card layout. Includes a hero section and static legal content.
frontend/src/pages/WhyUsPage.tsx: React page rendering the Why Us section with differentiators, process steps, and styled hero/differentiator sections.
frontend/src/utils/jobId.ts: Provides job ID validation and a helper to return a standardized validation error message.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing site rebuild goals, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and existing implemented features.
